siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt:
Yes,  You can change the name of a variable but if it is in use in charts or text boxes on the dashboard it will not
display values anymore. You can always fixâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: Yes, You can change the name of a variable but if it is in use in charts or text boxes on the dashboard it will not display values anymore. You can always fix it by defining another variable with the same name as it was before.

frontmatter.title: Can I change the name of used variables?
